page.title: 12SHOP AND POST OFFICE-SUDBURY
page.content: The{shop}in Sudbury is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Martin. It sells lots of things like sweets,birthday cards, fruit and vegtables. They also own the{Post-Office}which used to be owned by Mr. Allen who is retired now. At the shop they get ten people an hour coming to buy thing and a hundred people a day. They have a lunch break at about half past one, only{half a day on {Wednesday}and it is not open at all on Sunday. They have deliveries every day but only papers on Sunday. Mr. Martin comes round on a Sunday morning to deliver the papers.
